{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks about the classification of angiofibroma based on its extension to one or more paranasal sinuses. We need to find a relevant document that describes the staging of angiofibroma. One such document is [Internal carotid artery supply of juvenile angiofibromas (author's transl)]. According to this document, all 12 cases described had involvement of the paranasal sinuses, and intracranial extension occurred only once. This suggests that extension to one or more paranasal sinuses may be characteristic of a particular stage of angiofibroma.", "answer_choice": C}
